net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component

Interface PagingRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagingStyle

    public interface PagingRenderer
    Paging renderer.

    Implementations are responsible for rendering the controls that allow a user to change pages.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(Pager pager, LayoutConstraint constraint, HTMLRenderContext context, Pageable pageTarget, int pageCount, int pageSpan, int pageListStart, int pageListStop)
      Render the paging controls.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(Pager pager,
            LayoutConstraint constraint,
            HTMLRenderContext context,
            Pageable pageTarget,
            int pageCount,
            int pageSpan,
            int pageListStart,
            int pageListStop)
        Render the paging controls. Implementors must call Pager.renderPageable(HTMLRenderContext)
        Parameters:
        pager - the Pager.
        constraint - the constraint.
        context - the render context.
        pageTarget - the component that is being paged.
        pageCount - the page count.
        pageSpan - the page span. See PagingDisplay.setPageSpan(int) .
        pageListStart - the starting page number.
        pageListStop - the ending page number.
